Class GLB<Queue,R>

        run
        

        public Rail<R> run(x10.lang.VoidFun_0_0  start)
        

        Declaration: run(start:()=>void):x10.lang.Rail[R].
        Run method. This method is called when users does not know the workload upfront.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        start - The method that (Root) initializes the workload that can start computation.
Other places first get their workload by stealing.
        

        

        •

workload in TaskQueue
